# Honyaku Wiki

Welcome to the Honyaku documentation wiki.

## Sections

- [APIs](apis/) - API endpoint documentation
- [Functions](functions/) - Xanoscript function documentation
- [Agents](agents/) - AI agent documentation
- [MCP Servers](mcp_servers/) - MCP server documentation
- [Middlewares](middlewares/) - Middleware documentation
- [Tables](tables/) - Database table documentation
- [Tasks](tasks/) - Scheduled task and job documentation
- [Shunyaku](shunyaku/) - Team-contributed pages

---

*API, function, table, and task docs are auto-generated from the Xanoscript codebase. Shunyaku pages are written manually by the team.*
